title: Key Mapping Conundrum
body:
So  I have been gone for 3 years. I come back to a whole bunch of new and exciting changes!

My problem is...when I remap NumEnter...it fires off the spell....AND opens chat...WHAT DO?

replies.body:
Something must have gone a little bonkers with your keybind settings where they're saved on the servers, so let's get those manually reset and then you should be able to get everything working the way you need!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Will check that out and get back to you.

Much thanks.
